Effective Study Tips

Maximize your learning with proven study techniques

Spaced Repetition

Review flashcards at increasing intervals to strengthen long-term memory retention.

Active Recall

Test yourself actively rather than just re-reading. Try to recall the definition before flipping the card.

Mixed Practice

Shuffle cards from different categories to improve discrimination and retention.
